Major_Arcs.title: Early Adventures of Alley Oop
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses the initial, shorter adventures of Alley Oop, including his rescue of King Guz and the troubles with his old dinosaur, setting the stage for his character and world.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Alley rescues King Guz and immediately demands repayment of an old debt, showcasing his opportunistic and somewhat humorous personality.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree Troubles
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop deals with his old dinosaur's clumsiness, leading to a discussion about its age and need for replacement.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trading and Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the theme of dinosaur trading, featuring cavemen seeking new dinosaurs and encountering humorous and unexpected issues during the process.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a New Dinosaur Model
sub_scenes.description: Two cavemen decide to trade their old dinosaur and visit a dealership to explore new options.

sub_scenes.title: The Zip-Pippy Test Drive and Sale
sub_scenes.description: The cavemen test drive a new dinosaur, which bites one of them, but they still proceed with the purchase.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zip-Pippy Test Drive and Unexpected Bite
The Zip-Pippy Test Drive and Unexpected Bite
The Zip-Pippy Test Drive and Unexpected Bite

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Trade-in
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop bids farewell to his old dinosaur and then takes Dinny to Honest Zog's to trade him in.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to Honest Zog's Dealership with Dinny
Journey to Honest Zog's Dealership with Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Mishap at Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Various sales attempts and a demonstration mishap occur at Honest Zog's, culminating in a character recognizing Dinny.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Price Haggling

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Unforeseen Adventure and Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dinny after his sale, depicting his accidental mistreatment, comfort from a large dinosaur, and a chaotic charge, culminating in his surprising return and Dinny's owner reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Comfort
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is wrongly accused of mistreating a dinosaur and is then comforted by a large dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Comfort and Reassurance from the Large Dinosaur

sub_scenes.title: The Impending Charge
sub_scenes.description: Dinny and the large dinosaur charge towards a group of cavemen preparing for confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Impending Charge and Boomer Kid Preparation

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rejection and Fishing Trip
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with romantic rejection for Alley Oop and transitions into a fishing trip filled with complaints about women and disruptive fishing behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop is invited to go fishing, and then invites Ooola, who rejects him.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Complaints and Quarrels
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen on a fishing trip complain about women and disruptive fishing practices, leading to a humorous insult and apology.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Noise and Womanly Insult

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of romantic competition, jealousy, and humorous misunderstandings in relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Romantic Competition and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: News of romantic competition for Oola spreads, leading to disbelief and eventual confirmation of her interest in another man.

narrative_arcs.title: Confronting the Truth of Oola's Infidelity

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Attack and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A jealous caveman attacks a smaller rival, but is rejected by the woman he is trying to impress.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Advice and Conflicting Techniques
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss romance, considering violent versus tender approaches, and decide to learn a 'French' technique.

sub_scenes.title: Comedic Romantic Failures
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen attempt romantic gestures with flowers and a branch, leading to jealousy, a misguided gift to a crocodile, and public laughter.

narrative_arcs.title: The Branch Offering and the Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Finger-Eating Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: An angry caveman's jealousy and outburst leads to a fight, accusations of cannibalism, and a surprising twist involving hand-kissing.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Romantic Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A cavewoman confronts a caveman (Alley Oop) about infidelity, leading to public shaming, a plea for forgiveness, and a sudden romantic turn.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Forgiveness and Frenchman Insult

Major_Arcs.title: The Disastrous Twist Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts the dangers and widespread chaos caused by a new dance craze, 'The Twist'.

sub_scenes.title: The Twist Dance Injury and Dismissal
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from 'The Twist' become apparent, and Alley Oop dismisses the dance as effeminate.

sub_scenes.title: Pressure to Dance and Ultimatum
sub_scenes.description: Ooola expresses frustration at Alley's refusal to dance and gives him an ultimatum to learn before a party.

sub_scenes.title: Disastrous Dance Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Alley attempts to learn the 'Twitch' from Ooola, with comically painful and clumsy results.

narrative_arcs.title: 决心学习舞蹈和有条件的教学
课程结束与弗洛格小姐

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Party and Hospital Chaos
sub_scenes.description: Alley attempts to dance at the party, facing mockery and inadvertently causing widespread injuries from 'The Twitch', leading to hospital chaos.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Historical Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a science fiction element, where researchers plan to send Alley Oop back in time to 16th-century Spain for historical research.

sub_scenes.title: The Research Problem and Time Travel Solution
sub_scenes.description: Historians discuss the lack of information about 16th-century Spain and decide to use a time machine to send Alley Oop to gather data.

narrative_arcs.title: 西班牙历史研究的难题
派遣艾 Alley Oop 获取真相

sub_scenes.title: Preparing for Time Travel and Romantic Interlude
sub_scenes.description: A scientist prepares the time machine while Alley Oop enjoys a romantic moment with Ooola before his mission.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Activation and Accidental Transport
sub_scenes.description: The time machine is activated, and Alley Oop and Ooola are unexpectedly transported to the 20th century.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in the 20th Century and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Wonmug welcomes Alley and Ooola to the 20th century and explains Alley's mission to Spain, despite Alley's initial reluctance.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Street Serenade
sub_scenes.description: Alley arrives in Spain and witnesses a street serenade, which he decides to intervene in.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Chaos
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop's intervention in the serenade leads to him knocking out a famous matador, and unexpectedly becoming a bullfighter himself.

narrative_arcs.title: 女友的愤怒与身份揭露
斗牛比赛延误与替补方案
竞技场观众与经理的初步反应

sub_scenes.title: Return to the Future and Romantic Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop returns to the future but faces Ooola's suspicion about his activities in Spain, despite completing his mission.

narrative_arcs.title: 竞技场上的赞扬与讽刺

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Power Struggles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous concept of being 'King for a Day' and the unexpected challenges and public reactions to temporary and self-proclaimed authority.

sub_scenes.title: The Start of King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: The concept of 'King for a Day' is introduced, with cavemen carrying a 'king' who issues commands.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Proclamation and Public Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A new 'king' makes a proclamation but faces immediate public rejection and rock-throwing.

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic Disputes and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on humorous domestic conflicts and misunderstandings between characters, particularly involving Guz and Ooma.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Pills and Dirty Feet
sub_scenes.description: Ooma scolds Guz for eating ulcer pills like bon-bons and then for having dirty feet on the clean floor, leading to a comical chase.

Major_Arcs.title: King and Wise Man Interactions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features interactions between the King and his wise man, highlighting the wise man's self-serving wisdom and the King's own domestic troubles.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Solution
sub_scenes.description: The King attempts to resolve a clam dispute using his wise man, who solves it by taking the clams for himself.

sub_scenes.title: Palace Fight and Financial Advice
sub_scenes.description: The King investigates a racket at the palace and receives self-serving financial advice from the wise man.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and Palace Fight

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Ulcer Troubles
sub_scenes.description: The King's dinner is interrupted by a concerned servant who becomes violent due to the King's ulcer.

narrative_arcs.title: The King's Dinner and Ulcer Concern

Major_Arcs.title: Post-Power Life and Bizarre Encounters
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc includes shorter, somewhat disconnected narratives about apologies, job refusals, a ruler stepping down, and a strange duck measurement, showcasing various aspects of caveman life.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Job Refusal
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen apologize and refuse jobs, highlighting themes of remorse and contentment.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology and Explanation After an Incident
Joy of Returning to Ordinary Life
Measuring and Speculation About a Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: Everyday Life and Fortune Telling
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents snapshots of everyday life, including fortune telling, romantic encounters, shaving, and barbershop visits.

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Teller and Romantic Prophecy
sub_scenes.description: A woman visits a fortune teller who predicts she will meet a handsome stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Sudden Departure and Shaving Advice
sub_scenes.description: A caveman abruptly leaves Ooola, and another caveman gives advice on peaceful shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Barbershop Visit
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen get shaved at a barbershop and express satisfaction with the service.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Experiment and Unexpected Outcome
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a scientist's time travel experiment which goes awry, bringing a Roman soldier to the present instead of the intended visitor.

sub_scenes.title: Setting Up Time Travel Experiment
sub_scenes.description: A scientist prepares a time machine, anticipating a visitor from the past.

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Roman Soldier Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Instead of the expected visitor, a Roman soldier materializes, surprising the scientist.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The scientist realizes the time machine is malfunctioning and decides to fix it.
